name: 冰橘布丁
description:
"Ice Orange Pudding" is a game that is falsely biased towards Qinglily and is based on the plot, interspersed with some small games and puzzle-solving games.
The game mainly tells about herself. In the future, a certain girl may be alone in order to invent a robot as her sister.
Leah
Growing up, a little childish girl, invented a robot for herself as her younger sister, and named Lisa.
Lisa
Just started looking for a robot with an idea of ​​how to survive. After that, life with Lisa gradually changed.
Wisteria
Leah and Leah were childhood sweethearts who grew up together. He is a serious and responsible person. There is also a character relationship, and she is often angry because of Leah.
